text: Douglas Lawrence Osowski (born January 1, 1969), known professionally as "Mr. Lawrence", is an American voice actor, comedian, writer, storyboard artist, animator, and director. He is known for his voice roles such as Plankton, Larry the Lobster, and the Realistic Fish Head in SpongeBob SquarePants. Lawrence was born in East Brunswick, New Jersey on January 1, 1969. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:American artists Category:American animators Category:American television directors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:People from East Brunswick, New Jersey
title: Mr. Lawrence
